trans-unit.source: The types in the <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting" /> namespace support .NET Framework hosting environments that use the caching features in ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting" /> 命名空间中的类型支持使用 ASP.NET 中的缓存功能的 .NET Framework 承载环境。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> class exposes a static <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
When a .NET Framework hosting environment starts individual application domains, it can set a reference to the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 托管环境在启动时各个应用程序域，它可以将引用设置为<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This enables the hosting environment to provide better integration with the cache.
trans-unit.target: 这使宿主环境，以提供与缓存的更好地集成。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting> namespace provides interfaces that a hosting environment can use to set a <xref:System.IServiceProvider> reference on the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting>命名空间提供可用于设置宿主环境的接口<xref:System.IServiceProvider>上引用<xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.Host%2A>属性。
